description: Numbers with digits nondecreasing and their reciprocals sum to 1/(positive integer).
comments: Intersection of A037264 and A009994, A214949(a(n)) = 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 02 2012
prog: (Haskell)a045910 n = a045910_list !! (n-1)a045910_list =  [x | x <- takeWhile (<= 999999999) $ a009994_list,                     a214949 x == 1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 02 2012
crossrefs: Condensation (by ordering digits) and completion of A037264.
author: _Len Smiley_
